translation.hydroDescription: The First Multi-Token Reward Protocol on Moonriver Network
translation.aboutUsTitle: Hydro is a community owned, fair launched Multi-Token Reward Protocol
translation.aboutUsDescription: Hydro operates using is a frictionless yield and liquidity generation smart contract which applies a <1>5%</1> fee to each buy transaction; and <1>10%</1> to each sell. This transaction fee is split into two portions which serve separate functions.
translation.aboutUsPoint2: A tax for each buy or sell transaction is collected
translation.aboutUsPoint3: 20% of the taxes gets added to the Liquidity Pool
translation.aboutUsPoint4: 80% of the taxes get elaborated by the buyback system
translation.aboutUsPoint5: 80% of previously collected taxes gets swapped into reward token and redistributed among Hydro Holders
translation.tokenomicsGridCommunityDesc: Hydro Protocol will be a community owned and fair launched
translation.tokenomicsLiquidityText: Every trade contributes towards auto-generating liquidity
translation.tokenomicsRewardText: Holders earn passive crypto rewards through static reflection
translation.buyingGuideStep1Description: Install Metamask. For an easy set up, follow their <1>guide</1>.
translation.buyingGuideStep2Title: Connect your wallet to Moonriver Network
translation.buyingGuideStep2Description:
Use chainlist to add the Moonriver RPC to your metamask wallet. Watch this <1>Youtube Guide for a more detailed guide.

Click this link to open Huckleberry Finance DEX. Connect your wallet. Sign when Metamask asks you to do so.
translation.buyingGuideStep3Title: Send some MOVR to the wallet
translation.buyingGuideStep3Description:
Once you've setup Metamask, you can send some MOVR from an exchange like Kucoin, Kraken, Gate.io.

Or if you prefer you can use the SolarBeam or Wanchain Bridge to bridge over your ETH here: <1>https://app.solarbeam.io/bridge or <1>https://bridge.wanchain.org/#/

Alternatively, you can swap cross-chain directly from ETH or BSC to $MOVR using <1>Rubic
translation.buyingGuideStep4Title: Send some MOVR to the wallet
translation.buyingGuideStep4Description:
Now you can swap your MOVR for $HYDRO on the Huckleberry Finance DEX, selecting amount of MOVR you wish to convert to $HYDRO and clicking swap.
Congratulations, you now hold $HYDRO..
translation.buyingGuideStep5Description: All that's left now is to HODL and see your rewards grow from reflections!
translation.connectToNetworkInfo: You need to connect to Moonriver network to proceed.
translation.migrateNoTokens: You don't have any tokens for migration.
translation.migrateNotAvailable: Migration is currently not available. Please wait for announcement.
